TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class CacheSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的全域快取區設定。

span.span: Configures the global cache settings for an ASP.NET application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別 (Class) 提供以程式的方法，存取和修改組態檔的 `` 區段。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `` section of a configuration file. ASP.NET 快取功能由實作類別。The ASP.NET caching feature is implemented by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce)。For more information, see [Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce). > [!NOTE] > 可將資訊寫入至 [區段] 屬性所定義的限制根據組態檔的相關區段其實。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 任何嘗試寫入組態檔不允許在階層中的層級，將會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取階層架構中的任何層級的組態資訊。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 快取是用來儲存經常存取資料的應用程式特定的雜湊資料表。A cache is an application-specific hash table used to store frequently accessed data. 應用程式和工作階段狀態的類似於快取中，最類似，因為其整個應用程式範圍的應用程式狀態。Application and session state are similar to the cache, the application state being the most similar, due to its application-wide scope. 快取和應用程式狀態機制之間的最大差異的其中一個是快取支援這些相依性會使得您能夠建置發生特定事件時，會自動移除快取項目中的應用程式的相依性。One of the biggest differences between the cache and the application-state mechanism is that the cache supports dependencies These dependencies make it possible to build applications that automatically remove cached items when certain events occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的網頁和相關程式碼檔案用來存取區段的屬性。The following code example shows a page and the related code file used to access the section attributes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultProvider { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定預設提供者。

span.span: Gets or sets the default provider.
The default provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出快取到期是否停用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache expiration is disabled.

value.span: 如果快取到期停用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cache expiration is disabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，永遠不過期的快取的項目。If the property is set to `true`, the cached items never expire. 這項設定被用來協助偵錯應用程式程式碼中的快取行為。This setting is intended to help debug cache behavior in application code. 停用快取到期時，這可能會導致快取的長度超過其皆有效的項目，使用警告。Use caution when disabling cache expiration, as this might result in items being cached longer than they are valid. > [!NOTE] > 若要加入頁面輸出快取，您必須建立該頁面的到期原則。To add a page to the output cache, you must establish an expiration policy for that page. 您可以使用以宣告方式[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞或以程式設計方式使用方法。You can do this declaratively with the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or programmatically using the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定 ASP.NET 網頁快取的到期值](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c8931600-b167-477d-bd5a-0186ac908646)。For more information, see [How to: Set Expiration Values for ASP.NET Page Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c8931600-b167-477d-bd5a-0186ac908646). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisableMemoryCollection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出快取記憶體回收是否停用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cache memory collection is disabled.

value.span: 如果快取記憶體回收停用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the cache memory collection is disabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，快取相關的 API 的呼叫會有任何作用。If the property is set to `true`, calls to the cache-related API will have no effect. 如果屬性設定為`true`，快取不會收集未使用的項目。If the property is set to `true`, the cache does not attempt to collect unused items. 請謹慎使用這項設定，因為停用記憶體回收可以快速地會導致應用程式的記憶體不足狀況。Use caution when using this setting, as disabling memory collection can quickly lead to Out of Memory conditions for the application. 此設定在 ASP.NET 內部快取或輸出快取上沒有任何作用。This setting has no effect on the ASP.NET internal cache or on the output cache. 如需不同類型的快取的詳細資訊，請參閱[快取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce)。For more information about the different types of cache, see [Caching](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac11c8ea-df5d-4de8-b315-9ccf1048b0ce). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PercentagePhysicalMemoryUsedLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示虛擬記憶體使用的最大百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum percentage of virtual memory usage.

value.span: 虛擬記憶體使用的最大百分比。

span.span: The maximum percentage of virtual memory usage.
The default value is 90%.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定高度壓力狀況的閾值。The property specifies the threshold for high pressure conditions. 為接近此閾值時，快取系統逐漸開始更積極的清除量值。As this threshold is approached, the cache system gradually begins more aggressive scavenging measures. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long PrivateBytesLimit { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示工作處理序最大的私用空間。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum size of the working-process private space.

value.span: 配置到工作處理序的最大私用空間位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number, in bytes, of the private space allocated to the working process.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定高度壓力狀況的閾值。The property specifies the threshold for high pressure conditions. 為接近此閾值時，快取系統逐漸開始更積極的清除量值。As this threshold is approached, the cache system gradually begins more aggressive scavenging measures. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/CS/readwritecache.aspx.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection/VB/readwritecache.aspx.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PrivateBytesPollTime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示工作處理序記憶體使用輪詢間的時間間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval between polling for the worker-process memory usage.

value.span: 工作處理序記憶體使用輪詢間的時間間隔。

span.span: The time interval between polling for the worker process memory usage.
The default value is 2 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個輪詢昂貴，而且可能需要調整快取調整演算法的回應速度與輪詢發出的呼叫數之間的權衡取捨。This polling is expensive and might need to be adjusted as a tradeoff between reaction speed of the cache-trimming algorithm and number of polling calls made.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
Public ReadOnly Property Providers As ProviderSettingsCollection

span.span: Gets the provider settings collection.
